00083 void clTetrahedron::GetFaceNodes(const int faceIndex, int *faceNodes) const
00084 {
00085   /*
00086   ** Returns the indeces of the nodes in tetrahedron system, given the face index
00087   */
00088 
00089   try
00090   {
00091     if(faceIndex<0 || faceIndex>=GetNumberFaces())
00092     {
00093       char message[MESLEN];
00094       sprintf(message, "Invalid face entry.\n  FACE = %d\n", faceIndex);
00095       throw clException("clTetrahedron", "GetFaceNodes", message);
00096     }
00097     else
00098     {
00099       switch(faceIndex)
00100       {
00101         case 0:
00102           faceNodes[0]=1;
00103           faceNodes[1]=2;
00104           faceNodes[2]=3;
00105           break;
00106         case 1:
00107           faceNodes[0]=0;
00108           faceNodes[1]=3;
00109           faceNodes[2]=2;
00110           break;
00111         case 2:
00112           faceNodes[0]=0;
00113           faceNodes[1]=1;
00114           faceNodes[2]=3;
00115           break;
00116         case 3:
00117           faceNodes[0]=0;
00118           faceNodes[1]=2;
00119           faceNodes[2]=1;
00120           break;
00121         default:
00122           char message[MESLEN];
00123           sprintf(message, "Invalid face entry.\n  FACE = %d\n", faceIndex);
00124           throw clException("clElement3D", "GetFaceNodes", message);
00125           break;
00126       }
00127     }
00128   }
00129 
00130   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00131   {
00132     EX.AddMethodToTree("clTetrahedron::GetFaceNodes");
00133     throw EX;
00134   }
00135 }

00137 int clTetrahedron::GetFaceNode(const int faceIndex, const int nodeIndex) const
00138 {
00139   /*
00140   ** Returns the index of the tetrahedron node, given the node index of a face index
00141   */
00142 
00143   int ret = -1;
00144 
00145   try
00146   {
00147     int faceNodes[3];
00148     GetFaceNodes(faceIndex, &faceNodes[0]);
00149 
00150     ret = faceNodes[nodeIndex];
00151   }
00152 
00153   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00154   {
00155     EX.AddMethodToTree("clTetrahedron::GetFaceNode");
00156     throw EX;
00157   }
00158 
00159   return(ret);
00160 }

00162 bool clTetrahedron::InSphereCriterion(const clNode3D *theNode)
00163 {
00164   //
00165   // IN    :  *theNode = the node to be tested for
00166   // RETURN:  1 if node falls within the circumsphere of current tetrahedron
00167   //          0 if node falls outside the circumsphere of current tetrahedron
00168   //
00169 
00170   bool  ret=false;
00171 
00172   try
00173   {
00174     clNode3D         centre = GetCircumCentre();
00175     double           radius = GetRadiusCircumsphere();
00176     tpMatrix<double> coord  = theNode->GetCoordinates();
00177 
00178     double r=sqrt((theNode->x() - centre.x())*(theNode->x() - centre.x()) +
00179                   (theNode->y() - centre.y())*(theNode->y() - centre.y()) +
00180                   (theNode->z() - centre.z())*(theNode->z() - centre.z()));
00181 
00182     if(r<radius)
00183     {
00184 //      cout << "ID= " << GetNumberID() << "; r= " << r << "; radius= " << radius << endl;
00185       ret=true;
00186     }
00187   }
00188 
00189   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00190   {
00191     EX.AddMethodToTree("clTetrahedron::InSphereCriterion");
00192     throw EX;
00193   }
00194 
00195   return(ret);
00196 }

00198 void clTetrahedron::CalculateCircumCentre(void)
00199 {
00200   //
00201   // IN    :
00202   // RETURN:
00203   //
00204 
00205   try
00206   {
00207     if(!IsHalo())
00208     {
00209       //THIS CALCULATION HAS COMPLETELY CHANGED!
00210       //WRONG ASSUMPTION OF MATRIX CALCULATION IN THESIS PAGE 35
00211       //SECOND MATRIX SHOULD NOT BE A MATRIX, BUT A VECTOR
00212 
00213       // Retrieve the nodes references
00214       int nodeIndices[4];
00215       nodeIndices[0]=parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(GetNodeID(0));
00216       nodeIndices[1]=parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(GetNodeID(1));
00217       nodeIndices[2]=parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(GetNodeID(2));
00218       nodeIndices[3]=parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(GetNodeID(3));
00219 
00220       // Retrieve the nodes
00221       clNode3D *nodes[4];
00222       nodes[0]=parentGrid->GetNodePointer(nodeIndices[0]);
00223       nodes[1]=parentGrid->GetNodePointer(nodeIndices[1]);
00224       nodes[2]=parentGrid->GetNodePointer(nodeIndices[2]);
00225       nodes[3]=parentGrid->GetNodePointer(nodeIndices[3]);
00226 
00227       double x1 = nodes[1]->x() - nodes[0]->x();
00228       double x2 = nodes[2]->x() - nodes[0]->x();
00229       double x3 = nodes[3]->x() - nodes[0]->x();
00230 
00231       double y1 = nodes[1]->y() - nodes[0]->y();
00232       double y2 = nodes[2]->y() - nodes[0]->y();
00233       double y3 = nodes[3]->y() - nodes[0]->y();
00234 
00235       double z1 = nodes[1]->z() - nodes[0]->z();
00236       double z2 = nodes[2]->z() - nodes[0]->z();
00237       double z3 = nodes[3]->z() - nodes[0]->z();
00238 
00239       double x12 = (nodes[1]->x() + nodes[0]->x()) * 0.5f;
00240       double x13 = (nodes[2]->x() + nodes[0]->x()) * 0.5f;
00241       double x14 = (nodes[3]->x() + nodes[0]->x()) * 0.5f;
00242 
00243       double y12 = (nodes[1]->y() + nodes[0]->y()) * 0.5f;
00244       double y13 = (nodes[2]->y() + nodes[0]->y()) * 0.5f;
00245       double y14 = (nodes[3]->y() + nodes[0]->y()) * 0.5f;
00246 
00247       double z12 = (nodes[1]->z() + nodes[0]->z()) * 0.5f;
00248       double z13 = (nodes[2]->z() + nodes[0]->z()) * 0.5f;
00249       double z14 = (nodes[3]->z() + nodes[0]->z()) * 0.5f;
00250 
00251       // Setup coefficient matrix
00252       tpMatrix<double> A(3,3);
00253       A.SetElement(1, 1, x1);
00254       A.SetElement(2, 1, x2);
00255       A.SetElement(3, 1, x3);
00256 
00257       A.SetElement(1, 2, y1);
00258       A.SetElement(2, 2, y2);
00259       A.SetElement(3, 2, y3);
00260 
00261       A.SetElement(1, 3, z1);
00262       A.SetElement(2, 3, z2);
00263       A.SetElement(3, 3, z3);
00264 
00265       // Setup solution matrix
00266       tpMatrix<double> B(3,1);
00267       B.SetElement(1, 1, x1*x12 + y1*y12 + z1*z12);
00268       B.SetElement(2, 1, x2*x13 + y2*y13 + z2*z13);
00269       B.SetElement(3, 1, x3*x14 + y3*y14 + z3*z14);
00270 
00271       // Solve for the centre coordinates
00272       tpMatrix<double> C = A.Solve(B);
00273 
00274       circumCentre.SetCoordinates(C(1,1),C(2,1),C(3,1));
00275     }
00276     else
00277     {
00278       char message[MESLEN];
00279       sprintf(message, "Tetrahedron protected.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", GetNumberID());
00280       throw clExceptionTree("clTetrahedron", "CalculateCircumCentre", message);
00281     }
00282   }
00283 
00284   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00285   {
00286     EX.AddMethodToTree("clTetrahedron::CalculateCircumCentre");
00287     throw EX;
00288   }
00289 }

00291 void clTetrahedron::CalculateCentroid(void)
00292 {
00293   //
00294   // Calculates the Centre of Gravity of the Tetrahedron
00295   //
00296   // IN    :
00297   // RETURN:
00298   //
00299 
00300   try
00301   {
00302     if(!IsHalo())
00303     {
00304       // Retrieve the nodes references
00305       int nodeIndices[4];
00306       nodeIndices[0]=parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(GetNodeID(0));
00307       nodeIndices[1]=parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(GetNodeID(1));
00308       nodeIndices[2]=parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(GetNodeID(2));
00309       nodeIndices[3]=parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(GetNodeID(3));
00310 
00311       // Retrieve the nodes
00312       clNode3D *nodes[4];
00313       nodes[0]=parentGrid->GetNodePointer(nodeIndices[0]);
00314       nodes[1]=parentGrid->GetNodePointer(nodeIndices[1]);
00315       nodes[2]=parentGrid->GetNodePointer(nodeIndices[2]);
00316       nodes[3]=parentGrid->GetNodePointer(nodeIndices[3]);
00317 
00318       double xm = (nodes[0]->x() + nodes[1]->x() + nodes[2]->x() + nodes[3]->x())*0.25f;
00319       double ym = (nodes[0]->y() + nodes[1]->y() + nodes[2]->y() + nodes[3]->y())*0.25f;
00320       double zm = (nodes[0]->z() + nodes[1]->z() + nodes[2]->z() + nodes[3]->z())*0.25f;
00321 
00322       centroid = clNode3D(1, xm, ym, zm);
00323     }
00324     else
00325     {
00326       char message[MESLEN];
00327       sprintf(message, "Tetrahedron protected.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", GetNumberID());
00328       throw clExceptionTree("clTetrahedron", "CalculateCentroid", message);
00329     }
00330   }
00331 
00332   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00333   {
00334     EX.AddMethodToTree("clTetrahedron::CalculateCentroid");
00335     throw EX;
00336   }
00337 }
00338 
00339 void clTetrahedron::CalculateRadiusCircumsphere(void)
00340 {
00341   try
00342   {
00343     // TODO: Is centrePoint hier ALTIJD al uitgerekend -> needs checking
00344     int              nodeIndex = parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(GetNodeID(0));
00345     clNode3D        *node      = parentGrid->GetNodePointer(nodeIndex);
00346 
00347     double           x = node->x()-circumCentre.x();
00348     double           y = node->y()-circumCentre.y();
00349     double           z = node->z()-circumCentre.z();
00350 
00351     radiusCircumsphere = sqrt(x*x + y*y + z*z);
00352   }
00353 
00354   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00355   {
00356     EX.AddMethodToTree("clTetrahedron::CalculateRadiusCircumsphere");
00357     throw EX;
00358   }
00359 }
00360 
00361 void clTetrahedron::CalculateVolume(void)
00362 {
00363   try
00364   {
00365     // Retrieve the nodes references
00366     int nodeIndices[4];
00367     nodeIndices[0]=parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(GetNodeID(0));
00368     nodeIndices[1]=parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(GetNodeID(1));
00369     nodeIndices[2]=parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(GetNodeID(2));
00370     nodeIndices[3]=parentGrid->GetNodeIndex(GetNodeID(3));
00371 
00372     // Retrieve the nodes
00373     clNode3D *nodes[4];
00374     nodes[0]=parentGrid->GetNodePointer(nodeIndices[0]);
00375     nodes[1]=parentGrid->GetNodePointer(nodeIndices[1]);
00376     nodes[2]=parentGrid->GetNodePointer(nodeIndices[2]);
00377     nodes[3]=parentGrid->GetNodePointer(nodeIndices[3]);
00378 
00379     double x1 = nodes[1]->x() - nodes[0]->x();
00380     double x2 = nodes[1]->y() - nodes[0]->y();
00381     double x3 = nodes[1]->z() - nodes[0]->z();
00382 
00383     double y1 = nodes[2]->x() - nodes[0]->x();
00384     double y2 = nodes[2]->y() - nodes[0]->y();
00385     double y3 = nodes[2]->z() - nodes[0]->z();
00386 
00387     double z1 = nodes[3]->x() - nodes[0]->x();
00388     double z2 = nodes[3]->y() - nodes[0]->y();
00389     double z3 = nodes[3]->z() - nodes[0]->z();
00390 
00391     double det1 = x1*(y2*z3-y3*z2);
00392     double det2 = x2*(y1*z3-y3*z1);
00393     double det3 = x3*(y1*z2-y2*z1);
00394     double det  = det1 - det2 + det3;
00395 
00396     if(det==0.0f)
00397     {
00398       char message[MESLEN];
00399       sprintf(message, "Invalid tetrahedron.\n    ELEMENTID = %d", GetNumberID());
00400       throw clExceptionTree("clTetrahedron", "CalculateVolume", message);
00401     }
00402     else
00403     {
00404       volume = det/6.0f;
00405     }
00406   }
00407 
00408   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00409   {
00410     EX.AddMethodToTree("clTetrahedron::CalculateVolume");
00411     throw EX;
00412   }
00413 }

00415 void clTetrahedron::CalculateCharacteristics(void)
00416 {
00417   try
00418   {
00419     if(!IsHalo() && !IsInitialised())
00420     {
00421       CalculateCircumCentre();
00422       CalculateCentroid();
00423       CalculateRadiusCircumsphere();
00424       CalculateVolume();
00425       SetInitialised();
00426     }
00427   }
00428 
00429   catch(clExceptionTree EX)
00430   {
00431     EX.AddMethodToTree("clTetrahedron::CalculateCharacteristics");
00432     throw EX;
00433   }
00434 }

00439   return(circumCentre);
